{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher iraisonablem Preis zu haben seyen :
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE>
de An.
<YEAR>1738</YEAR>
& 
<YEAR>1739</YEAR>
.
</BIBL>

<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE>
maiores
<VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>
,
 samtl. in
<FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
.
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE>
ex Editione
<AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolaes ex Ponto</TITLE>
mit
<AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR>
Anmerckungen
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR>
Graece & Latine cum notis
<AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR>
Graece & Latine cum notis
<AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE>
</BIBL>
;
und
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>
,
 samtl. in
<FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
.
</BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"The original XML contained several encoding errors for special characters (e.g., \u221a, \u00fc, \u2264). These have been corrected to their proper representations ('ü', 'ö', '4to', '8vo'). Additionally, some tags were not properly closed or nested, which has been rectified for better structure. Specifically, the 'YEAR' tags for 1738 and 1739 were not closed, and the 'FORMAT' tags were incorrectly encoded. The structure of nested BIBL tags was also inconsistent and has been standardized."}

<ITEM>
2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher iraisonablem Preis zu haben seyen :
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE>
de An.
<YEAR>1738</YEAR>
& 
<YEAR>1739</YEAR>
.
</BIBL>

<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE>
maiores
<VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>
,
 samtl. in
<FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
.
<BIBL>
<TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE>
ex Editione
<AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolaes ex Ponto</TITLE>
mit
<AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR>
Anmerckungen
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR>
Graece & Latine cum notis
<AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR>
Graece & Latine cum notis
<AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE>
</BIBL>
;
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE>
</BIBL>
;
und
<BIBL>
<AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR>
<TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>
,
 samtl. in
<FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
.
</BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The original XML contained several encoding errors for special characters (e.g., \u221a, \u00fc, \u2264). These have been corrected to their proper representations ('ü', 'ö', '4to', '8vo'). Additionally, some tags were not properly closed or nested, which has been rectified for better structure. Specifically, the 'YEAR' tags for 1738 and 1739 were not closed, and the 'FORMAT' tags were incorrectly encoded. The structure of nested BIBL tags was also inconsistent and has been standardized.
